text: included admiral package extension expect developers adhere following standards: Code Conduct Manifesto Programming Strategy Development Process Follow consistent workflow checks CRAN Release means 90% greater test coverage developed repository template order reduce burden developers follow standards. template also help harmonize admiral family R packages, ensure consistent user experience ease installing adopting packages. mind, expect core package dependencies versions used admiral.

what: What is included in the template
title: ADaM in R Asset Library - Extension
text: repository template includes following: License file (Apache 2.0 - company co-developers need added copyright section) Required folders (R; test; templates; vignettes; renv; etc) Set-files (DESCRIPTION; NAMESPACE; renv.lock; etc) Issue Templates (Bug Template; Feature Request; Documentation Request/Update; Onboarding) Pull Request Template Workflow actions (selection generic specific CI/CD auto-checks) Package badges (Test coverage; etc) Branch protection rules
